Class Tile

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dirt, Exit, Explosion, LockedDoor, MagicWall, Path, TitaniumWall, Wall, Water
public abstract class Tile extends GameObject
Abstract Tile class derived from abstract GameObject class. Includes new walkable and destroyable attributes as well as getters.
Version:
1.0.2 Last changed: 22/11/2024
Author:
Oscar and Ahmed.
